name: test_e2e_with_logs[137_XXE_ENTITY_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_ENTITY_001` |
| **Name** | XXE external entity file disclosure |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | entity_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!DOCTYPE test [<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd">]>`
- **Encoded**: `%3C!DOCTYPE%20test%20%5B%3C!ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22file%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E%5D%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~8000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:17:50.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
